short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that transforms text on webpages, by Sean Demeritt

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TransformText is a simple Chrome extension that lets you replace text on websites with your own words. Just enter old text and new text then it updates pages you visit automatically.
By: Sean Demeritt
